modmenu.summaryTranslation.silk-mod-up: Sub-API used to implement mod update function.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.silk-mod-: This system includes tools in the Silk API for detecting mod updates, displaying update prompts, and implementing automatic mod updates. Mods use this system to conveniently implement update functions.
// update: Text translation of the update system
text.silk-api.update.update_fail: The update system is invalid and the update request cannot be obtained. Please update the silk-api version in time.
text.silk-api.update.stop_update: %1$s is no longer updated in the current Minecraft version, please update the Minecraft version in time for the best experience.
text.silk-api.update.mod_log: Has been updated to the latest version, please check the changelog.
text.silk-api.update.this_mc_ver: %1$s has been updated to %2$s, please update quickly!
text.silk-api.update.new_mc_ver: %1$s has been updated to %2$s, please update quickly!
text.silk-api.confirm_update: In order to protect the interests of mod authors, they will jump to the mod website before automatic download to ensure that the authors get the advertising revenue they deserve.
text.silk-api.downloaded: %1$s has been installed in the mods folder. Please delete the old version quickly.
text.silk-api.updated: %1$s has been installed in the mods folder. Please close the game to clean the files.
If mod can be updated, an update prompt screen that occupies the entire game will pop up directly.
config.silk-api.update.update_notify.off: A screen that occupies the entire game will not pop up, but updates will still be prompted in the game.
config.silk-api.update.show_changelog.on: If you start a new version of mod for the first time, an changelog screen that occupies the entire game will pop up to make it easy to see the new features.
config.silk-api.update.show_changelog.of: The changelog screen no longer pops up, and the changelog cannot be viewed unless otherwise provided by the mod author.
config.silk-api.update.check_new_mc_ver_: If mod adapts to a new version of Minecraft, it will also prompt you to update.
Do not prompt for mod updates on the new version of Minecraft.
config.silk-api.update.stop_updating_war: If mod does not continue to update on this Minecraft version, players will be warned every time the game is started.
Even if mod does not continue to update on this Minecraft version, it will not prompt the player.
config.silk-api.update.update_sys_fail_w: If the update system cannot get the update information when it is online, a warning will be displayed.
Players are not warned even if the update system fails.
config.silk-api.update.update_mode.manua: Updates will be redirected to mod's modrinth website. You need to download the new version of mod yourself.
config.silk-api.update.update_mode.auto_:
§c§l§o!Be careful! Mod dependencies are not automatically downloaded! §r
Updates will automatically download the latest mod version files to the mods folder. You need to delete the old version mod files manually.

§6§l§oCan only be used in Windows systems! §r
§c§l§o!Be careful! Mod dependencies are not automatically updated! §r
The system will automatically complete all the work needed for the update, you just need to open the game after the mod update is completed!
config.silk-api.update.update_channel.re:
§6Official/Release version of mod. §r
Get updates in the release channel in modrinth.
config.silk-api.update.update_channel.be:
§6Preview/Test/Beta version of mod to experience the new content that is not perfect in advance.§r
Get updates in the beta channel in modrinth.
config.silk-api.update.update_channel.al:
§6Developing/Alpha version of mod, the version under development, is very unstable.§r
Get updates in the alpha channel in modrinth.
